languages.text: "Владайм Токара, пред строгим взором Императора я обвиняю тебя в презрении к дарованному Им Кредо, покровительстве преступающим закон еретикам, свершении злодеяний против преданных слуг Его и восстании против воли Его с оружием в руках!"

"Vladaym Tocara, I charge you before the Emperor's stern gaze with contempt for the Creed He gave us, with harbouring lawless heretics, with crimes against His loyal servants, and with armed rebellion against His will!"
languages.original_text: "Владайм Токара, пред строгим взором Императора я обвиняю тебя в презрении к дарованному Им Кредо, покровительстве преступающим закон еретикам, свершении злодеяний против преданных слуг Его и восстании против воли Его с оружием в руках!"

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym Tocara, I charge you before the Emperor's stern gaze with contempt for the Creed He gave us, with harbouring lawless heretics, with crimes against His loyal servants, and with armed rebellion against His will!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym Tocara, I charge you before the Emperor's stern gaze with contempt for the Creed He gave us, with harbouring lawless heretics, with crimes against His loyal servants, and with armed rebellion against His will!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym Tocara, I charge you before the Emperor's stern gaze with contempt for the Creed He gave us, with harbouring lawless heretics, with crimes against His loyal servants, and with armed rebellion against His will!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “弗拉迪姆·托卡拉，我在帝皇严厉的目光下，指控你蔑视祂赐予我们的信条。你包庇无法无天的异端分子，对祂忠诚的仆人犯下罪行，还纠结武装势力，反抗祂的旨意！”
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara, I charge you before the Emperor's stern gaze with contempt for the Creed He gave us, with harbouring lawless heretics, with crimes against His loyal servants, and with armed rebellion against His will!"

traits.locale_text: “弗拉迪姆·托卡拉，我在帝皇严厉的目光下，指控你蔑视祂赐予我们的信条。你包庇无法无天的异教徒，对祂忠诚的仆人犯下罪行，还纠结武装势力，反抗祂的旨意！”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「ヴラダイム・トカラ。お前は与えられた信条を侮蔑し、無法な異端者を匿い、皇帝の忠実な召使に対する犯罪を犯し、皇帝の意志に反する武力反乱を起こした。皇帝の監視下においてお前を告発する」
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara, I charge you before the Emperor's stern gaze with contempt for the Creed He gave us, with harbouring lawless heretics, with crimes against His loyal servants, and with armed rebellion against His will!"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴラダイム・トカラ。お前は与えられた信条を侮蔑し、無法な異端者を匿い、皇帝の忠実な召使に対する犯罪を犯し、皇帝の意志に反する武力反乱を起こした。皇帝の監視下においてお前を告発する」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «¡Vladaym Tocara, le acuso ante la severa mirada del Emperador de despreciar el credo que Él nos dio, de dar cobijo a herejes sin ley, de crímenes contra Sus siervos leales y de rebelión armada contra Su voluntad!».
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara, I charge you before the Emperor's stern gaze with contempt for the Creed He gave us, with harbouring lawless heretics, with crimes against His loyal servants, and with armed rebellion against His will!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Vladaym Tocara, le acuso ante la severa mirada del Emperador de despreciar el credo que Él nos dio, de dar cobijo a herejes sin ley, de crímenes contra Sus siervos leales y de rebelión armada contra Su voluntad!».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Vladaym Tocara, ich klage Euch vor dem strengen Blick des Imperators der Missachtung des Glaubens an, den er uns geschenkt hat; der Beherbergung gesetzloser Ketzer; der Verbrechen gegen seine treuen Diener; und der bewaffneten Rebellion gegen seinen Willen!"
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara, I charge you before the Emperor's stern gaze with contempt for the Creed He gave us, with harbouring lawless heretics, with crimes against His loyal servants, and with armed rebellion against His will!"

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym Tocara, ich klage Euch vor dem strengen Blick des Imperators der Missachtung des Glaubens an, den er uns geschenkt hat; der Beherbergung gesetzloser Ketzer; der Verbrechen gegen seine treuen Diener; und der bewaffneten Rebellion gegen seinen Willen!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Vladaym Tocara, je vous accuse céans, devant le regard sévère de l'Empereur, d'outrage à Son Crédo, de dissimulation d'hérétiques hors-la-loi, de crimes contre Ses fidèles serviteurs et de rébellion armée contre Sa volonté ! »
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara, I charge you before the Emperor's stern gaze with contempt for the Creed He gave us, with harbouring lawless heretics, with crimes against His loyal servants, and with armed rebellion against His will!"

traits.locale_text: « Vladaym Tocara, je vous accuse céans, devant le regard sévère de l'Empereur, d'outrage à Son Crédo, de dissimulation d'hérétiques hors-la-loi, de crimes contre Ses fidèles serviteurs et de rébellion armée contre Sa volonté ! »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Vladaym Tocara, seni; İmparator'un bize bahşettiği İtikat'e itaatsizlikle, kanun tanımaz kâfirlere yataklık etmekle, O'nun sadık hizmetkârlarına karşı suç işlemekle ve O'nun iradesine karşı silahlı ayaklanma başlatmakla itham ediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara, I charge you before the Emperor's stern gaze with contempt for the Creed He gave us, with harbouring lawless heretics, with crimes against His loyal servants, and with armed rebellion against His will!"

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym Tocara, seni, İmparator'un bize bahşettiği İtikat'e itaatsizlikten, kanun tanımaz kâfirlere yataklık etmekten, O'nun sadık hizmetkârlarına karşı suç işlemekten ve O'nun iradesine karşı silahlı ayaklanma başlatmaktan itham ediyorum!"
traits.speaker: Chorda
